nodes.text: Yed'ore'shenai, core name Doresh, was a Chiss male lieutenant in the Chiss Expansionary Defense Force stationed at the Sith Empire's Dorn Base on Hoth during the renewed war with the Galactic Republic. Around 3642 BBY, he informed an Imperial individual that Talz commandos were training Republic soldiers in their cold weather ambush tactics. He then asked the Imperial to disrupt the Republic's training camp and destroy the Talz and Republic forces that were camped there.
